  1. model.card

Uses of Class
model.card.Card

Packages that use Card
Package
Description
engine
The engine package contains the core game logic and management classes for the Jackaroo game.
model.card
The model.card package contains classes representing the cards used in the Jackaroo game.
model.card.standard
The model.card.standard package contains classes representing the standard playing cards used in the Jackaroo game.
model.card.wild
The model.card.wild package contains the wild card classes used in the Jackaroo game.
model.player
The model.player package contains classes related to player management in the Jackaroo game.
